title: League won't open after i click agree to join a game
body: Can someone help me solve this stuff. After joining a game i have black screen and can't do anything

replies.body:
If you're seeing a black screen in champ select, your connection to the matchmaking servers is most likely *poor or unstable*. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will ensure your local network settings are properly configured for League and should resolve this issue.

Let me know if this helped.

I am facing a similar problem, I can queue up, but after the 'Queue Pops' It freezes on the ready check screen, then proceeds to run down the timer and says I did not ready up... I have been placed into a queue dodge timer.
